habit_item.description: Swipeable card or simple tap-to-complete row. Left side: Icon + Name. Right side: Streak + Checkbox.

radar_chart.description: Hexagonal radar chart showing 6 stats. Filled area with low opacity, bright stroke.

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Used heavily for cards, nav bars, and overlays to allow background wallpapers to shine through.
visual_enhancers.neon_glow: Used on active states, primary buttons, and chart lines.
visual_enhancers.confetti: Trigger on habit completion and level up.
visual_enhancers.backgrounds: User customizable. Default to abstract dark neon.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement a 'ThemeContext' that handles both 'dark/light' mode AND 'wallpaper' selection.
Use 'recharts' for the Radar Chart. Ensure it is responsive.
Data persistence MUST be 'localStorage'. Create a custom hook 'useLocalStorage' for habits and user stats.
The RPG logic (XP calculation, Level up) should be in a dedicated utility or hook.
Ensure the app is PWA ready (manifest, icons, service worker registration if possible, or at least responsive meta tags).
Do not use default Shadcn colors blindly. Override them with the Neon palette defined in 'colors'.
For the 'Habit List', use a virtualized list if there are many habits, but standard map is fine for < 50.
Add a 'Confetti' effect (use 'react-confetti' or similar) when a user levels up.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
